description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Pizza Dough recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pizza dough,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Pizza Dough Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour and arrowroot together in a large bowl. Stir in psyllium, yeast and 1 teaspoon salt. Make a well in the centre and add 3/4 cup warm water and oil. Mix together until dough starts to form, adding a little more water if necessary. Knead on a lightly floured surface until smooth.
Place into a lightly greased bowl, turning to coat surface with oil. Cover with plastic. Set aside in a warm place for 30 minutes until doubled in size.
Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Place a pizza stone into the oven to preheat.

Uncover dough and turn out onto a lightly floured surface. Divide dough into 8 portions. Roll or press out each portion on baking paper to about 12cm. Brush lightly with oil and transfer to heated pizza stone. Cook for 5 minutes. Spread with gluten-free passata and toppings. Bake for 5-10 minutes or until golden and cheese is melted and serve.
